mutants.code:
def reverse_array(nums):
    reversed_nums = nums[::+1]
    reversed_nums.sort(reverse=True)
    return reversed_nums

def reverse_array(nums):
    reversed_nums = nums[::-1]
    reversed_nums.sort(reverse=False)
    return reversed_nums

def reverse_array(nums):
    reversed_nums = nums[::-2]
    reversed_nums.sort(reverse=True)
    return reversed_nums

def reverse_array(nums):
    reversed_nums = nums[::-0]
    reversed_nums.sort(reverse=True)
    return reversed_nums

def reverse_array(nums):
    reversed_nums = nums[::-0]
    reversed_nums.sort(reverse=True)
    return reversed_nums

def reverse_array(nums):
    reversed_nums = nums[::--1]
    reversed_nums.sort(reverse=True)
    return reversed_nums
